Description: Iterable is a cross-channel marketing platform that powers unified customer experiences and empowers you to create, optimize and measure every interaction across the entire customer journey.
Name: Iterable

Methods.Name: List Updated Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get metadata about campaigns updated since last successful run.

Methods.Name: List Child Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get metadata about child campaigns in a recurring campaign.

Methods.Name: List New Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get metadata about campaigns created since last successful run.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Get metadata about campaigns in a project.

Methods.Name: Get User by Email
Methods.Description: Get a user by their email address.

Methods.Name: Get User by ID
Methods.Description: Get a user by their ID.

Methods.Name: Get New Lists
Methods.Description: Get all lists within a project created since the last successful run date.

Methods.Name: Get List Users
Methods.Description: Get all users within a list.

Methods.Name: Get Lists
Methods.Description: Get all lists within a project.
